name: Pixel RPG
description:
Journey across the realm of Florencia and save the townsfolk from the invading monsters.  Travel far into the caverns and deep into the underbelly of the land in order to find new weapons and defeat vicious demons.  In Pixel RPG, you will become a hero to everyone.

**Note:  This is not a final version of the game, and there may still be a few bugs left.  However, it is still fun to play, and please, save before pressing continue!!
